apps.name: Tails
apps.localizedDescription:
Tails is an e621.net/e926.net browser app designed to improve the viewing experience over a web browser on iPhones and iPads:
– Infinite Scrolling
– Hi-Res Images
– Local Tag Subscriptions
– WebM Player

Tails also includes support for browsing pools, favoriting and voting on posts, autocompleting search and image downloading to your device.

More information at https://tails.safo.fi!

Contact:
Email: tails@safo.fi
Telegram: t.me/SafoSnep
App updates: t.me/TailsApp (channel) and t.me/TailsChat (chat group)
apps.versionDescription:
- Adds iOS 15 compatibility in addition to iOS 14
- Allows playing WebM videos fullscreen
- Fixes updating and caching issues with favorited tags
- Improves the performance of thumbnail lists and fixes visual glitches with updating them

news.title: Tails gains iOS 15 compatibility
news.caption: With version 2.1 Tails becomes compatible with iOS 15, and contains other useful bug fixes too!

news.title: A Big Tails Update
news.caption: After a long time in the making, a new version of Tails is now available. Check out the app page for release notes! As always, any feedback is very welcome. @SafoSnep

news.title: A Message from Safo
news.caption: You've installed Tails' AltStore source! 🎉 If you have any questions, I can be reached by tails@safo.fi and in Telegram at t.me/SafoSnep.
